document.docAuthor: Meisch, Claude, Smith, Robin J. & Martens, Koen
document.masterDocTitle: A subjective global checklist of the extant non-marine Ostracoda (Crustacea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A subjective global checklist of the extant non-marine Ostracoda (Crustacea)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Stenocypris derupta Vávra, 1906
: AT, OL, PA

Stenocypris exsiccata ( Vávra, 1897 ) G.W. Müller 1912
: AT

bibRefCitation.author: Vavra
bibRefCitation.refString: Vavra W. 1897. Die Susswasser-Ostracoden Deutsch-Ost-Afrikas. In: Mobius K. (ed.) Die Tierwelt Ost- Afrikas und der Nachbargebiete 4 (2 - 3): 1 - 28.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Stenocypris fontinalis (Vávra, 1895) G.W. Müller 1912
: AT, AU, NT, PA

Stenocypris intermedia Klie, 1932
: NA, OL, PA

Syn.:
Stenocypris macedonica Petkovski & Meisch, 1996
(fide Martens 2001a )

Syn.:
Stenocypris malcolmsoni lata Ghetti, 1972
(fide Petkovski & Meisch 1996 )

Stenocypris major (Baird, 1859) Daday 1898
: AT, NA, NT, OL, PA, PAC

Syn.:

(fide Martens & Behen 1994 )

Syn.:
Cypris chittyensis Baird, 1862
(fide Martens & Behen 1994 )

Syn.: *

(fide Martens & Behen 1994 )

Syn.:
Stenocypris major okuboi Petkovski & Meisch, 1996
(fide Martens 2001a )

bibRefCitation.author: Petkovski & Meisch
bibRefCitation.refString: Petkovski T. & Meisch C. 1996. Species of the genus Stenocypris Sars, 1889 from the rice-fields of Macedonia (Crustacea, Ostracoda). Travaux scientifiques du Musee national d'Histoire naturelle de Luxembourg 23: 57 - 85.

subSubSection.paragraph:
